alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 27 at 12:07PM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations, including the city of Casper. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, including along Interstate 25 and along HWY 258 south of Casper.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
